name: Losing iT (Aviad Cohen, mamanelad, Guy Mizrachi, Elior Digmi)
name_original: Losing iT (Aviad Cohen, mamanelad, Guy Mizrachi, Elior Digmi)
description:
An abstract experience minimalist game, Take a journey into the madness and try to understand what is real and what is just in your head. 

IT'S NOT GOING TO BE THAT EASY.

do you  understand what part of the world and what's not? 

Are you Losing-iT?!

      --- Designers --- 

Aviad Cohen, Guy Mizrachi

      --- Developers ---

Elad Maman, Elior Digmi

      --- Guidance --- 

Dani Bacon, Itamar Ernst,  Mati Ernst,  Nir Lahad and  Omer Zadok

Game Jam class, Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design 2022 

      --- Music --- 

Yussef Dayes, Alfa Mist, Mansur Brown and Rocco Palladino
